content.rendered:
C2 Pro is a high performance time and attendance terminal aimed at the middle and high-end market. Equipped with a highly efficient Dual-Core 1GHz processor, C2 Pro sustains higher performance by finishing the comparison in less than 0.5 seconds.

Features

  • User – 3000
  • Record – 100,000
  • Display – 3.5-inch TFT Screen
  • Communication – Tcp/Ip,USB Host, RS232, WiFi.
  • Identification mode – Fingerprint, Password, Card.
  • RFID card – HID Prox Card / iClass Card, Allegion Card, Mifare/DesFire.
  • Identification speed – <0.5s>
  • Power – DC 5V-12V 1A
